title: Inspired by GBBO? Tips and tricks for perfect pastry, plus some delicious recipes
text:
This week on the Great British Bake Off the semi-finalists were tasked with pastry; a savoury tarte tatin signature using puff pastry, a Morrocan pie technical and a vertical pie showstopper.

This week, we’re focusing on the basics of pastry, too, with a collection of tips from Michelin-starred chefs and food writers on all matters shortcrust and puff.
